short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for saving and retrieving website URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever find yourself struggling to remember the URL of a website you visited in the past, or spending too much time typing search queries trying to find a specific page? Our browser extension is here to help! With just a few clicks, you can save website URLs and corresponding titles directly from your browser, and access them quickly and easily through our extension interface. No more tedious searching or bookmarking needed!

Our extension allows you to keep track of all your favorite websites, important work-related pages, and any other online resources you need to access frequently. Simply save them with our easy-to-use interface, and retrieve them later by searching for the page title. It's that simple!

And don't worry about security - our extension only collects the minimum amount of data necessary to provide this functionality, and we never share or use your data for any other purpose. So why wait? Install our extension today and start organizing your browsing experience like a pro!
